casebody.data:
BARWIN REALTY COMPANY, Appellant, v. UNITED STATES, Appellee. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. December 17, 1928. No. 90. Henry A. Ingraham, of New York City (Walter Gordon Merritt, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Wm. A. De Groot, U. S. Atty., of Brooklyn, N. Y. (C. M. Charest, Gen. Counsel, Bureau of Internal Revenue, and Ralph S. Scott, Sp. Atty., Bureau of Internal Revenue, both of Washington, D. C., of counsel), for the United States.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and SWAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment [25 F.(2d) 1003] affirmed.
